bug.short_desc: supertuxkart crashes when I click on story mode

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: I can start the program just fine, but when I click on Story Mode at the main menu screen, the program crashes. This has happened four times in a row. I can let the program start and sit there, and it'll be fine. I clicked on Singleplayer, that loaded, then I clicked back and then Story Mode and it crashed again like before.
